unknown.Name: Unknown Constellation
Descriptions: Information about this Constellation is coming soon.

albedo.Name: Flower of Eden
Descriptions: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

albedo.Name: Opening of Phanerozoic
Descriptions: Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:

Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
This effect stacks up to 4 times.

albedo.Name: Grace of Helios
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

albedo.Name: Descent of Divinity
Descriptions: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.

albedo.Name: Tide of Hadean
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

albedo.Name: Dust of Purification
Descriptions: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.

alhaitham.Name: Intuition
Descriptions: When a Projection Attack hits an opponent, Universality: An Elaboration on Form's CD is decreased by 1.2s. This effect can be triggered once every 1s.

alhaitham.Name: Debate
Descriptions: When Alhaitham generates a Chisel-Light Mirror, his Elemental Mastery will be increased by 50 for 8 seconds, max 4 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently. This effect can be triggered even when the maximum number of Chisel-Light Mirrors has been reached.

alhaitham.Name: Negation
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Universality: An Elaboration on Form by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

alhaitham.Name: Elucidation
Descriptions: When Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena is unleashed, the following effects will become active based on the number of Chisel-Light Mirrors consumed and created this time around:
Each Mirror consumed will increase the Elemental Mastery of all other nearby party members by 30 for 15s.
Each Mirror generated will grant Alhaitham a 10% Dendro DMG Bonus for 15s.
The pre-existing duration of the aforementioned effects will be cleared if you use Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena again while they are in effect.

alhaitham.Name: Sagacity
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

alhaitham.Name: Structuration
Descriptions: Alhaitham gains the following effects:
2 seconds after Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena is unleashed, he will generate 3 Chisel-Light Mirrors regardless of the number of mirrors consumed.
If Alhaitham generates Chisel-Light Mirrors when their numbers have already maxed out, his CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG will increase by 10% and 70% respectively for 6s.
If this effect is triggered again during its initial duration, the duration remaining will be increased by 6s.

aloy.Name: Star of Another World
Descriptions: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

aloy.Name: Star of Another World
Descriptions: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

aloy.Name: Star of Another World
Descriptions: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

aloy.Name: Star of Another World
Descriptions: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

aloy.Name: Star of Another World
Descriptions: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

aloy.Name: Star of Another World
Descriptions: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

amber.Name: One Arrow to Rule Them All
Descriptions: Fires 2 arrows per Aimed Shot. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

amber.Name: Bunny Triggered
Descriptions: Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.
Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

amber.Name: It Burns!
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Fiery Rain by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

amber.Name: It's Not Just Any Doll...
Descriptions: Decreases Explosive Puppet's CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

amber.Name: It's Baron Bunny!
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Explosive Puppet by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

amber.Name: Wildfire
Descriptions: Fiery Rain increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.

kamisato_ayaka.Name: Snowswept Sakura
Descriptions: When Kamisato Ayaka's Normal or Charged Attacks deal Cryo DMG to opponents, it has a 50% chance of decreasing the CD of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 0.3s. This effect can occur once every 0.1s.

kamisato_ayaka.Name: Blizzard Blade Seki no To
Descriptions: When casting Kamisato Art: Soumetsu, unleashes 2 smaller additional Frostflake Seki no To, each dealing 20% of the original storm's DMG.

kamisato_ayaka.Name: Frostbloom Kamifubuki
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Soumetsu by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

kamisato_ayaka.Name: Ebb and Flow
Descriptions: Opponents damaged by Kamisato Art: Soumetsu's Frostflake Seki no To will have their DEF decreased by 30% for 6s.

kamisato_ayaka.Name: Blossom Cloud Irutsuki
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

kamisato_ayaka.Name: Dance of Suigetsu
Descriptions: Kamisato Ayaka gains Usurahi Butou every 10s, increasing her Charged Attack DMG by 298%. This buff will be cleared 0.5s after Ayaka's Charged ATK hits an opponent, after which the timer for this ability will restart.

kamisato_ayato.Name: Kyouka Fuushi
Descriptions: Shunsuiken DMG is increased by 40% against opponents with 50% HP or less.

kamisato_ayato.Name: World Source
Descriptions: Namisen's maximum stack count is increased to 5. When Kamisato Ayato has at least 3 Namisen stacks, his Max HP is increased by 50%.

kamisato_ayato.Name: To Admire the Flowers
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Kyouka by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

kamisato_ayato.Name: Endless Flow
Descriptions: After using Kamisato Art: Suiyuu, all nearby party members will have 15% increased Normal Attack SPD for 15s.

kamisato_ayato.Name: Bansui Ichiro
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Suiyuu by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

kamisato_ayato.Name: Boundless Origin
Descriptions: After using Kamisato Art: Kyouka, Ayato's next Shunsuiken attack will create 2 extra Shunsuiken strikes when they hit opponents, each one dealing 450% of Ayato's ATK as DMG.
Both these Shunsuiken attacks will not be affected by Namisen.

baizhu.Name: Attentive Observation
Descriptions: Universal Diagnosis gains 1 additional charge.

baizhu.Name: Incisive Discernment
Descriptions: When your own active character hits a nearby opponent with their attacks, Baizhu will unleash a Gossamer Sprite: Splice.
Gossamer Sprite: Splice will initiate 1 attack before returning, dealing 250% of Baizhu's ATK as Dendro DMG and healing for 20% of Universal Diagnosis's Gossamer Sprite's normal healing.
DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG.
This effect can be triggered once every 5s.

baizhu.Name: All Aspects Stabilized
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Holistic Revivification by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

baizhu.Name: Ancient Art of Perception
Descriptions: For 15s after Holistic Revivification is used, Baizhu will increase all nearby party members' Elemental Mastery by 80.

baizhu.Name: The Hidden Ebb and Flow
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Universal Diagnosis by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

baizhu.Name: Elimination of Malicious Qi
Descriptions: Increases the DMG dealt by Holistic Revivification's Spiritveins by 8% of Baizhu's Max HP.

Additionally, when a Gossamer Sprite or Gossamer Sprite: Splice hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of generating one of Holistic Revivification's Seamless Shields. This effect can only be triggered once by each Gossamer Sprite or Gossamer Sprite: Splice.

barbara.Name: Gleeful Songs
Descriptions: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

barbara.Name: Vitality Burst
Descriptions: Decreases the CD of Let the Show Begin♪ by 15%.
During the ability's duration, your active character gains a 15% Hydro DMG Bonus.

barbara.Name: Star of Tomorrow
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Shining Miracle♪ by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

barbara.Name: Attentiveness be My Power
Descriptions: Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her.
A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

barbara.Name: The Purest Companionship
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Let the Show Begin♪ by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

barbara.Name: Dedicating Everything to You
Descriptions: When Barbara is in the party but not on the field, and one of your own party members falls:
Automatically revives the fallen character.
Fully restores the revived character's HP to 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

beidou.Name: Sea Beast's Scourge
Descriptions: When Stormbreaker is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs Electro DMG 250% more effectively.

beidou.Name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
Descriptions: Stormbreaker's arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

beidou.Name: Summoner of Storm
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Tidecaller by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

beidou.Name: Stunning Revenge
Descriptions: Upon being attacked, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain an additional instance of 20% Electro DMG for 10s.

beidou.Name: Crimson Tidewalker
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Stormbreaker by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

beidou.Name: Bane of Evil
Descriptions: During the duration of Stormbreaker, the Electro RES of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.

bennett.Name: Grand Expectation
Descriptions: Fantastic Voyage's ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.

bennett.Name: Impasse Conqueror
Descriptions: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

bennett.Name: Unstoppable Fervor
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Passion Overload by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

bennett.Name: Unexpected Odyssey
Descriptions: Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of Passion Overload's Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed.
This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

bennett.Name: True Explorer
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Fantastic Voyage by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

bennett.Name: Fire Ventures with Me
Descriptions: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside Fantastic Voyage's radius gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus and their weapons are infused with Pyro.

candace.Name: Returning Heiress of the Scarlet Sands
Descriptions: The duration of Prayer of the Crimson Crown effect triggered by Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide is increased by 3s.

candace.Name: Moon-Piercing Brilliance
Descriptions: When Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum hits opponents, Candace's Max HP will be increased by 20% for 15s.

candace.Name: Hunter's Supplication
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

candace.Name: Sentinel Oath
Descriptions: Shortens the Hold CD of Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum to be the same as that of the Tapping CD.

candace.Name: Heterochromatic Gaze
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

candace.Name: The Overflow
Descriptions: When characters (excluding Candace herself) affected by the Prayer of the Crimson Crown caused by Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide deal Elemental DMG to opponents using Normal Attacks, an attack wave will be unleashed that deals AoE Hydro DMG equal to 15% of Candace's Max HP.
This effect can trigger once every 2.3s and is considered Elemental Burst DMG.

charlotte.Name: A Need to Verify Facts
Descriptions: After Still Photo: Comprehensive Confirmation heals a character, it will mark them with Verification, which will heal them once every 2s for 80% of Charlotte's ATK. This effect lasts 6s.

charlotte.Name: A Duty to Pursue Truth
Descriptions: When using Framing: Freezing Point Composition, when Monsieur Verite hits 1/2/3 (or more) opponents, Charlotte's own ATK will be increased by 10%/20%/30% for 12s.

charlotte.Name: An Imperative to Independence
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Still Photo: Comprehensive Confirmation by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

charlotte.Name: A Responsibility to Oversee
Descriptions: When Still Photo: Comprehensive Confirmation hits an opponent marked by Snappy Silhouette or Focused Impression, it will deal 10% more DMG and restore 2 Energy to Charlotte. This restoration can be triggered 5 times every 20s.

charlotte.Name: A Principle of Conscience
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Framing: Freezing Point Composition by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

charlotte.Name: A Summation of Interest
Descriptions: When the active character's Normal and Charged Attacks hit an opponent marked by Framing: Freezing Point Composition's Focused Impression, Monsieur Verite will initiate a coordinated attack that deals 180% of Charlotte's ATK as AoE Cryo DMG and heals active character(s) within the AoE for 42% of Charlotte's ATK. This effect can be triggered once every 6s and both DMG and healing dealt in this way will be considered as having been done by Charlotte's Elemental Burst.

chevreuse.Name: Stable Front Line's Resolve
Descriptions: When the active character with the "Coordinated Tactics" status (not including Chevreuse herself) triggers the Overloaded reaction, they will recover 6 Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 10s.
You must first unlock the Passive Talent "Vanguard's Coordinated Tactics."

chevreuse.Name: Sniper Induced Explosion
Descriptions: After Holding Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire and hitting a target, 2 chain explosions will be triggered near the location where said target is hit. Each explosion deals Pyro DMG equal to 120% of Chevreuse's ATK. This effect can be triggered up to once every 10s, and DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG.

chevreuse.Name: Practiced Field Stripping Technique
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

chevreuse.Name: The Secret to Rapid-Fire Multishots
Descriptions: After using Ring of Bursting Grenades, the Hold mode of Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire will not go on cooldown when Chevreuse uses it.
This effect is removed after Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire has been fired twice using Hold or after 6s.

chevreuse.Name: Enhanced Incendiary Firepower
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Ring of Bursting Grenades by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

chevreuse.Name: In Pursuit of Ending Evil
Descriptions: After 12s of the healing effect from Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire, all nearby party members recover HP equivalent to 10% of Chevreuse's Max HP once.
After a party member is healed by Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire, they gain a 20% Pyro DMG Bonus and Electro DMG Bonus for 8s. Max 3 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently.

chongyun.Name: Ice Unleashed
Descriptions: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as Cryo DMG to all opponents in its path.

chongyun.Name: Atmospheric Revolution
Descriptions: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost have their CD time decreased by 15%.

chongyun.Name: Cloudburst
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

chongyun.Name: Frozen Skies
Descriptions: Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by Cryo.
This effect can only occur once every 2s.

chongyun.Name: The True Path
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

chongyun.Name: Rally of Four Blades
Descriptions: Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.
This skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.

collei.Name: Deepwood Patrol
Descriptions: When in the party and not on the field, Collei's Energy Recharge is increased by 20%.

collei.Name: Through Hill and Copse
Descriptions: The Passive Talent Floral Sidewinder is changed to this:
The Floral Ring will grant the character the Sprout effect from Floral Sidewinder upon return, dealing 40% of Collei's ATK as Dendro DMG to nearby opponents for 3s.

From the moment of using Floral Brush to the moment when this instance of Sprout effect ends, if any of your party members triggers Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon reactions, the Sprout effect will be extended by 3s.
The Sprout effect can only be extended this way once. If another Sprout effect is triggered during its initial duration, the initial effect will be removed.
Requires you to have unlocked the Floral Sidewinder Passive Talent.

collei.Name: Scent of Summer
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Floral Brush by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

collei.Name: Gift of the Woods
Descriptions: Using Trump-Card Kitty will increase all nearby characters' Elemental Mastery by 60 for 12s (not including Collei herself).

collei.Name: All Embers
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Trump-Card Kitty by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

collei.Name: Forest of Falling Arrows
Descriptions: When the Floral Ring hits, it will create a miniature Cuilein-Anbar that will deal 200% of Collei's ATK as Dendro DMG.
Each Floral Brush can only create one such miniature Cuilein-Anbar.

cyno.Name: Ordinance: Unceasing Vigil
Descriptions: After using Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness, Cyno's Normal Attack SPD will be increased by 20% for 10s. If the Judication effect of his Passive Talent Featherfall Judgment is triggered during Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer, the duration of this increase will be refreshed.
You need to unlock the Passive Talent "Featherfall Judgement."

cyno.Name: Ceremony: Homecoming of Spirits
Descriptions: When Cyno's Normal Attacks hit opponents, his Electro DMG Bonus will increase by 10% for 4s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Max 5 stacks.

cyno.Name: Precept: Lawful Enforcer
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

cyno.Name: Austerity: Forbidding Guard
Descriptions: When Cyno is in the Pactsworn Pathclearer state triggered by Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness, after he triggers Electro-Charged, Superconduct, Overloaded, Quicken, Aggravate, Hyperbloom, or an Electro Swirl reaction, he will restore 3 Elemental Energy for all nearby party members (except himself.)
This effect can occur 5 times within one use of Sacred Rite: Wolf’s Swiftness.

cyno.Name: Funerary Rite: The Passing of Starlight
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

cyno.Name: Raiment: Just Scales
Descriptions: After using Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness or triggering the Judication effect of the Passive Talent "Featherfall Judgment," Cyno will gain 4 stacks of the "Day of the Jackal" effect. When he hits opponents with Normal Attacks, he will consume 1 stack of "Day of the Jackal" to fire off one Duststalker Bolt.
"Day of the Jackal" lasts for 8s. Max 8 stacks. It will be canceled once Pactsworn Pathclearer ends.
A maximum of 1 Duststalker Bolt can be unleashed this way every 0.4s.
You must first unlock the Passive Talent "Featherfall Judgment."

dehya.Name: The Flame Incandescent
Descriptions: Dehya's Max HP is increased by 20%, and she deals bonus DMG based on her Max HP when using the following attacks:
Molten Inferno's DMG will be increased by 3.6% of her Max HP.
Leonine Bite's DMG will be increased by 6% of her Max HP.

dehya.Name: The Sand-Blades Glittering
Descriptions: When Dehya uses Molten Inferno: Ranging Flame, the duration of the recreated Fiery Sanctum field will be increased by 6s.
Additionally, when a Fiery Sanctum exists on the field, DMG dealt by its next coordinated attack will be increased by 50% when active character(s) within the Fiery Sanctum field are attacked.

dehya.Name: A Rage Swift as Fire
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Leonine Bite by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

dehya.Name: An Oath Abiding
Descriptions: When Flame-Mane's Fist and Incineration Drive attacks unleashed during Leonine Bite hit opponents, they will restore 1.5 Energy for Dehya and 2.5% of her Max HP. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s.

dehya.Name: The Alpha Unleashed
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Molten Inferno by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

dehya.Name: The Burning Claws Cleaving
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Molten Inferno by 3.

Additionally, after a Flame-Mane's Fist attack hits an opponent and deals CRIT Hits during a single Blazing Lioness state, it will cause the CRIT DMG of Leonine Bite to increase by 15% for the rest of Blazing Lioness's duration and extend that duration by 0.5s. This effect can be triggered every 0.2s. The duration can be extended for a maximum of 2s and CRIT DMG can be increased by a maximum of 60% this way.

diluc.Name: Conviction
Descriptions: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

diluc.Name: Searing Ember
Descriptions: When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.
This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

diluc.Name: Fire and Steel
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Searing Onslaught by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

diluc.Name: Flowing Flame
Descriptions: Casting Searing Onslaught in rhythm greatly increases damage dealt.
2s after casting Searing Onslaught, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for 2s.

diluc.Name: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Dawn by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

diluc.Name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of the Dark
Descriptions: After casting Searing Onslaught, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.
Additionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.

diona.Name: A Lingering Flavor
Descriptions: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of Signature Mix end.

diona.Name: Shaken, Not Purred
Descriptions: Increases Icy Paws' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%.
Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the Icy Paws shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.

diona.Name: A—Another Round?
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Signature Mix by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

diona.Name: Wine Industry Slayer
Descriptions: Within the radius of Signature Mix, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%.

diona.Name: Double Shot, On The Rocks
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Icy Paws by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

diona.Name: Cat's Tail Closing Time
Descriptions: Characters within Signature Mix's radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:
Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.
Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.

dori.Name: Additional Investment
Descriptions: The number of After-Sales Service Rounds created by Troubleshooter Shots is increased by 1.

dori.Name: Special Franchise
Descriptions: When you are in combat and the Jinni heals the character it is connected to, it will fire a Jinni Toop from that character's position that deals 50% of Dori's ATK DMG.

dori.Name: Wonders Never Cease
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Alcazarzaray's Exactitude by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

dori.Name: Discretionary Supplement
Descriptions: The character connected to the Jinni will obtain the following buffs based on their current HP and Energy:
When their HP is lower than 50%, they gain 50% Incoming Healing Bonus.
When their Energy is less than 50%, they gain 30% Energy Recharge.

dori.Name: Value for Mora
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

dori.Name: Sprinkling Weight
Descriptions: Dori gains the following effects for 3s after using Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon:
Electro Infusion.
When Normal Attacks hit opponents, all nearby party members will heal HP equivalent to 4% of Dori's Max HP. This type of healing can occur once every 0.1s.

eula.Name: Tidal Illusion
Descriptions: Every time Icetide Vortex's Grimheart stacks are consumed, Eula's Physical DMG is increased by 30% for 6s.
Each stack consumed will increase the duration of this effect by 6s up to a maximum of 18s.

eula.Name: Lady of Seafoam
Descriptions: Decreases the CD of Icetide Vortex's Holding Mode, rendering it identical to Tapping CD.

eula.Name: Lawrence Pedigree
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Glacial Illumination by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

eula.Name: The Obstinacy of One's Inferiors
Descriptions: Lightfall Swords deal 25% increased DMG against opponents with less than 50% HP.

eula.Name: Chivalric Quality
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Icetide Vortex by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

eula.Name: Noble Obligation
Descriptions: Lightfall Swords created by Glacial Illumination start with 5 stacks of energy. Normal Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts have a 50% chance to grant the Lightfall Sword an additional stack of energy.

faruzan.Name: Truth by Any Means
Descriptions: Faruzan can fire off a maximum of 2 Hurricane Arrows using fully charged Aimed Shots while under the effect of a single Manifest Gale created by Wind Realm of Nasamjnin.

faruzan.Name: Overzealous Intellect
Descriptions: The duration of the Dazzling Polyhedron created by The Wind's Secret Ways is increased by 6s.

faruzan.Name: Spirit-Orchard Stroll
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Wind Realm of Nasamjnin by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

faruzan.Name: Divine Comprehension
Descriptions: The vortex created by Pressurized Collapses will restore Energy to Faruzan based on the number of opponents hit: If it hits 1 opponent, it will restore 2 Energy for Faruzan. Each additional opponent hit will restore 0.5 more Energy for Faruzan.
A maximum of 4 Energy can be restored to her per vortex.

faruzan.Name: Wonderland of Rumination
Descriptions: Increases the Level of The Wind's Secret Ways by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

faruzan.Name: The Wondrous Path of Truth
Descriptions: Characters affected by The Wind's Secret Ways' Prayerful Wind's Benefit have 40% increased CRIT DMG when they deal Anemo DMG. When the active character deals DMG while affected by Prayerful Wind's Benefit, they will apply Pressurized Collapse to the opponent damaged. This effect can be triggered once every 3s. This CD is shared between all party members.

fischl.Name: Gaze of the Deep
Descriptions: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl performs a Normal Attack against an opponent, Oz fires a joint attack, dealing DMG equal to 22% of Fischl's ATK.

fischl.Name: Devourer of All Sins
Descriptions: When Nightrider is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

fischl.Name: Wings of Nightmare
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Nightrider by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fischl.Name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
Descriptions: When Midnight Phantasmagoria is used, it deals 222% of ATK as Electro DMG to surrounding opponents.
When the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.

fischl.Name: Against the Fleeing Light
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Midnight Phantasmagoria by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fischl.Name: Evernight Raven
Descriptions: Extends the duration of Oz's presence on the field by 2s. Additionally, Oz performs joint attacks with your active character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as Electro DMG.

freminet.Name: Dreams of the Foamy Deep
Descriptions: The CRIT Rate of Pressurized Floe: Shattering Pressure will be increased by 15%.

freminet.Name: Penguins and the Land of Plenty
Descriptions: Unleashing Pressurized Floe: Shattering Pressure will restore 2 Energy to Freminet. If a Pressure Level 4 Shattering Pressure is unleashed, this will restore 3 Energy.

freminet.Name: Song of the Eddies and Bleached Sands
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Normal Attack: Flowing Eddies by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

freminet.Name: Dance of the Snowy Moon and Flute
Descriptions: After Freminet triggers Frozen, Shatter, or Superconduct against opponents, his ATK will be increased by 9% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. This can be triggered once every 0.3s.

freminet.Name: Nights of Hearth and Happiness
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Pressurized Floe by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

freminet.Name: Moment of Waking and Resolve
Descriptions: After Freminet triggers Frozen, Shatter, or Superconduct against opponents, his CRIT DMG will be increased by 12% for 6s. Max 3 stacks. This can be triggered once every 0.3s.

furina.Name: "Love Is a Rebellious Bird That None Can Tame"
Descriptions: When using Let the People Rejoice, Furina will gain 150 Fanfare.
Additionally, Furina's Fanfare limit is increased by 100.

furina.Name: "A Woman Adapts Like Duckweed in Water"
Descriptions: While Let the People Rejoice lasts, Furina's Fanfare gain from increases or decreases in nearby characters' HP is increased by 250%. Each point of Fanfare above the limit will increase Furina's Max HP by 0.35%. Her maximum Max HP increase is 140%.

furina.Name: "My Secret Is Hidden Within Me, No One Will Know My Name"
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Let the People Rejoice by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

furina.Name: "They Know Not Life, Who Dwelt in the Netherworld Not!"
Descriptions: When the Salon Members from Salon Solitaire hit an opponent, or the Singer of Many Waters restores HP to the active character, Furina will restore 4 Energy. This effect triggers once every 5s.

furina.Name: "His Name I Now Know, It Is...!"
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Salon Solitaire by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

furina.Name: "Hear Me — Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!"
Descriptions: When using Salon Solitaire, Furina gains "Center of Attention" for 10s.

Throughout the duration, Furina's Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, and Plunging Attacks are converted into Hydro DMG which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion. DMG is also increased by an amount equivalent to 18% of Furina's max HP.

Throughout the duration, Furina's Normal Attacks (not including Arkhe: Seats Sacred and Secular Attacks), Charged Attacks, and the impact of Plunging Attacks will cause different effects up to every 0.1s after hitting opponents depending on her current Arkhe alignment:
Arkhe: Ousia
Every 1s, all nearby characters in the party will be healed by 4% of Furina's max HP, for a duration of 2.9s. Triggering this effect again will extend its duration.
Arkhe: Pneuma

This Normal Attack (not including Arkhe: Seats Sacred and Secular Attacks), Charged Attack, or Plunging Attack ground impact DMG will be further increased by an amount equivalent to 25% of Furina's max HP. When any of the attacks mentioned previously hit an opponent, all nearby characters in the party will consume 1% of their current HP.

During the duration of each instance of "Center of Attention," the above effects can be triggered up to 6 times. "Center of Attention" will end when its effects have triggered 6 times or when the duration expires.

ganyu.Name: Dew-Drinker
Descriptions: Taking DMG from a Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow or Frostflake Arrow Bloom decreases opponents' Cryo RES by 15% for 6s.
A hit regenerates 2 Energy for Ganyu. This effect can only occur once per Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow, regardless if Frostflake Arrow itself or its Bloom hit the target.

ganyu.Name: The Auspicious
Descriptions: Trail of the Qilin gains 1 additional charge.

ganyu.Name: Cloud-Strider
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Celestial Shower by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

ganyu.Name: Westward Sojourn
Descriptions: Opponents standing within the AoE of Celestial Shower take increased DMG. This effect strengthens over time.
Increased DMG taken begins at 5% and increases by 5% every 3s, up to a maximum of 25%.
The effect lingers for 3s after the opponent leaves the AoE.

ganyu.Name: The Merciful
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Trail of the Qilin by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

ganyu.Name: The Clement
Descriptions: Using Trail of the Qilin causes the next Frostflake Arrow shot within 30s to not require charging.

gorou.Name: Rushing Hound: Swift as the Wind
Descriptions: When characters (other than Gorou) within the AoE of Gorou's General's War Banner or General's Glory deal Geo DMG to opponents, the CD of Gorou's Inuzaka All-Round Defense is decreased by 2s. This effect can occur once every 10s.

gorou.Name: Sitting Hound: Steady as a Clock
Descriptions: While General's Glory is in effect, its duration is extended by 1s when a nearby active character obtains an Elemental Shard from a Crystallize reaction. This effect can occur once every 0.1s. Max extension is 3s.

gorou.Name: Mauling Hound: Fierce as Fire
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Inuzaka All-Round Defense by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

gorou.Name: Lapping Hound: Warm as Water
Descriptions: When General's Glory is in the "Impregnable" or "Crunch" states, it will also heal active characters within its AoE by 50% of Gorou's own DEF every 1.5s.

gorou.Name: Striking Hound: Thunderous Force
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Juuga: Forward Unto Victory by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

gorou.Name: Valiant Hound: Mountainous Fealty
Descriptions: For 12s after using Inuzaka All-Round Defense or Juuga: Forward Unto Victory, increases the CRIT DMG of all nearby party members' Geo DMG based on the buff level of the skill's field at the time of use:
"Standing Firm": +10%
"Impregnable": +20%
"Crunch": +40%
This effect cannot stack and will take reference from the last instance of the effect that is triggered.

shikanoin_heizou.Name: Named Juvenile Casebook
Descriptions: For 5s after Shikanoin Heizou takes the field, his Normal Attack SPD is increased by 15%. He also gains 1 Declension stack for Heartstopper Strike. This effect can be triggered once every 10s.

shikanoin_heizou.Name: Investigative Collection
Descriptions: The pull effect of the Arresting Windtunnel created by Windmuster Kick is enhanced, and its duration is increased to 1s.

shikanoin_heizou.Name: Esoteric Puzzle Book
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Heartstopper Strike by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

shikanoin_heizou.Name: Tome of Lies
Descriptions: The first Windmuster Iris explosion in each Windmuster Kick will regenerate 9 Elemental Energy for Shikanoin Heizou. Every subsequent explosion in that Windmuster Kick will each regenerate an additional 1.5 Energy for Heizou.
One Windmuster Kick can regenerate a total of 13.5 Energy for Heizou in this manner.

shikanoin_heizou.Name: Secret Archive
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Windmuster Kick by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

shikanoin_heizou.Name: Curious Casefiles
Descriptions: Each Declension stack will increase the CRIT Rate of the Heartstopper Strike unleashed by 4%. When Heizou possesses Conviction, this Heartstopper Strike's CRIT DMG is increased by 32%.

hu_tao.Name: Crimson Bouquet
Descriptions: While in a Paramita Papilio state activated by Guide to Afterlife, Hu Tao's Charge Attacks do not consume Stamina.

hu_tao.Name: Ominous Rainfall
Descriptions: Increases the Blood Blossom DMG by an amount equal to 10% of Hu Tao's Max HP at the time the effect is applied.
Additionally, Spirit Soother will also apply the Blood Blossom effect.

hu_tao.Name: Lingering Carmine
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Guide to Afterlife by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

hu_tao.Name: Garden of Eternal Rest
Descriptions: Upon defeating an enemy affected by a Blood Blossom that Hu Tao applied herself, all nearby allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 15s.

hu_tao.Name: Floral Incense
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Spirit Soother by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

hu_tao.Name: Butterfly's Embrace
Descriptions: Triggers when Hu Tao's HP drops below 25%, or when she suffers a lethal strike:

Hu Tao will not fall as a result of the DMG sustained. Additionally, for the next 10s, all of her Elemental and Physical RES is increased by 200%, her CRIT Rate is increased by 100%, and her resistance to interruption is greatly increased.
This effect triggers automatically when Hu Tao has 1 HP left.
Can only occur once every 60s.

arataki_itto.Name: Stay a While and Listen Up
Descriptions: After using Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!, Arataki Itto gains 2 stacks of Superlative Superstrength. After 1s, Itto will gain 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength every 0.5s for 1.5s.

arataki_itto.Name: Gather 'Round, It's a Brawl!
Descriptions: After using Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!, each party member whose Element is Geo will decrease that skill's CD by 1.5s and restore 6 Energy to Arataki Itto.
CD can be decreased by up to 4.5s in this manner. Max 18 Energy can be restored in this manner.

arataki_itto.Name: Horns Lowered, Coming Through
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Masatsu Zetsugi: Akaushi Burst! by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

arataki_itto.Name: Jailhouse Bread and Butter
Descriptions: When the Raging Oni King state caused by Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil! ends, all nearby party members gain 20% DEF and 20% ATK for 10s.

arataki_itto.Name: 10 Years of Hanamizaka Fame
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil! by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

arataki_itto.Name: Arataki Itto, Present!
Descriptions: Arataki Itto's Charged Attacks deal +70% Crit DMG. Additionally, when he uses Arataki Kesagiri, he has a 50% chance to not consume stacks of Superlative Superstrength.

jean.Name: Spiraling Tempest
Descriptions: Increases the pulling speed of Gale Blade after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

jean.Name: People's Aegis
Descriptions: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

jean.Name: When the West Wind Arises
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Dandelion Breeze by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

jean.Name: Lands of Dandelion
Descriptions: Within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze, all opponents have their Anemo RES decreased by 40%.

jean.Name: Outbursting Gust
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Gale Blade by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

jean.Name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
Descriptions: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.

kaeya.Name: Excellent Blood
Descriptions: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

kaeya.Name: Never-Ending Performance
Descriptions: Every time Glacial Waltz defeats an opponent during its duration, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

kaeya.Name: Dance of Frost
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Frostgnaw by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

kaeya.Name: Frozen Kiss
Descriptions: Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs Cryo DMG with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.

kaeya.Name: Frostbiting Embrace
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Glacial Waltz by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

kaeya.Name: Glacial Whirlwind
Descriptions: Glacial Waltz will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.

kaveh.Name: Sublime Salutations
Descriptions: Within 3s after using Artistic Ingenuity, Kaveh's Dendro RES and Incoming Healing Bonus will be increased by 50% and 25% respectively.

kaveh.Name: Grace of Royal Roads
Descriptions: Kaveh's Normal Attack SPD increases by 15% during Painted Dome.

kaveh.Name: Profferings of Dur Untash
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Painted Dome by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

kaveh.Name: Feast of Apadana
Descriptions: Dendro Cores created from Bloom reactions Kaveh triggers will deal 60% more DMG when they burst.

kaveh.Name: Treasures of Bonkhanak
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Artistic Ingenuity by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

kaveh.Name: Pairidaeza's Dreams
Descriptions: When Kaveh's Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks hit opponents during Painted Dome, they will unleash Pairidaeza's Light upon the opponent's position, dealing 61.8% of Kaveh's ATK as AoE Dendro DMG and causing all Dendro Cores within that AoE to burst. This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

kaedehara_kazuha.Name: Scarlet Hills
Descriptions: Decreases Chihayaburu's CD by 10%.
Using Kazuha Slash resets the CD of Chihayaburu.

kaedehara_kazuha.Name: Yamaarashi Tailwind
Descriptions: The Autumn Whirlwind field created by Kazuha Slash has the following effects:
Increases Kaedehara Kazuha's own Elemental Mastery by 200.
Increases the Elemental Mastery of characters within the field by 200.
The Elemental Mastery-increasing effects of this Constellation do not stack.

kaedehara_kazuha.Name: Maple Monogatari
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Chihayaburu by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

kaedehara_kazuha.Name: Oozora Genpou
Descriptions: When Kaedehara Kazuha's Energy is lower than 45, he obtains the following effects:
Pressing or Holding Chihayaburu regenerates 3 or 4 Energy for Kaedehara Kazuha, respectively.
When gliding, Kaedehara Kazuha regenerates 2 Energy per second.

kaedehara_kazuha.Name: Wisdom of Bansei
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Kazuha Slash by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

kaedehara_kazuha.Name: Crimson Momiji
Descriptions: After using Chihayaburu or Kazuha Slash, Kaedehara Kazuha gains an Anemo Infusion for 5s. Additionally, each point of Elemental Mastery will increase the DMG dealt by Kaedehara Kazuha's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack by 0.2%.

keqing.Name: Thundering Might
Descriptions: Recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as AoE Electro DMG at the start point and terminus of her Blink.

keqing.Name: Keen Extraction
Descriptions: When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents affected by Electro, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

keqing.Name: Foreseen Reformation
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Starward Sword by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

keqing.Name: Attunement
Descriptions: For 10s after Keqing triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, her ATK is increased by 25%.

keqing.Name: Beckoning Stars
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Stellar Restoration by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

keqing.Name: Tenacious Star
Descriptions: When initiating a Normal Attack, a Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% Electro DMG Bonus for 8s.
Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.

kirara.Name: Material Circulation
Descriptions: Every 8,000 Max HP Kirara possesses will cause her to create 1 extra Cat Grass Cardamom when she uses Secret Art: Surprise Dispatch. A maximum of 4 extra can be created this way.

kirara.Name: Perfectly Packaged
Descriptions: When Kirara is in the Urgent Neko Parcel state of Meow-teor Kick, she will grant other party members she crashes into Critical Transport Shields.
The DMG absorption of Critical Transport Shield is 40% of the maximum absorption Meow-teor Kick's normal Shields of Safe Transport are capable of, and will absorb Dendro DMG with 250% effectiveness.
Critical Transport Shields last 12s and can be triggered once on each character every 10s.

kirara.Name: Universal Recognition
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Meow-teor Kick by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

kirara.Name: Steed of Skanda
Descriptions: After active character(s) protected by Shields of Safe Transport or Critical Transport Shields hit opponents with Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks, Kirara will perform a coordinated attack with them using Small Cat Grass Cardamoms, dealing 200% of her ATK as Dendro DMG. DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Burst DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 3.8s. This CD is shared between all party members.

kirara.Name: A Thousand Miles in a Day
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Secret Art: Surprise Dispatch by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

kirara.Name: Countless Sights to See
Descriptions: All nearby party members will gain 12% All Elemental DMG Bonus within 15s after Kirara uses her Elemental Skill or Burst.

klee.Name: Chained Reactions
Descriptions: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of Sparks 'n' Splash's DMG.

klee.Name: Explosive Frags
Descriptions: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty's mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

klee.Name: Exquisite Compound
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Jumpy Dumpty by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

klee.Name: Sparkly Explosion
Descriptions: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of Sparks 'n' Splash, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

klee.Name: Nova Burst
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Sparks 'n' Splash by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

klee.Name: Blazing Delight
Descriptions: While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.
When Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.

sangonomiya_kokomi.Name: At Water's Edge
Descriptions: While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by Nereid's Ascension, the final Normal Attack in Sangonomiya Kokomi's combo will unleash a swimming fish to deal 30% of her Max HP as Hydro DMG.
This DMG is not considered Normal Attack DMG.

sangonomiya_kokomi.Name: The Clouds Like Waves Rippling
Descriptions: Sangonomiya Kokomi gains the following Healing Bonuses with regard to characters with 50% or less HP via the following methods:
Kurage's Oath Bake-Kurage: 4.5% of Kokomi's Max HP.
Nereid's Ascension Normal and Charged Attacks: 0.6% of Kokomi's Max HP.

sangonomiya_kokomi.Name: The Moon, A Ship O'er the Seas
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Nereid's Ascension by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

sangonomiya_kokomi.Name: The Moon Overlooks the Waters
Descriptions: While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by Nereid's Ascension, Sangonomiya Kokomi's Normal Attack SPD is increased by 10%, and Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.8 Energy for her.
This effect can occur once every 0.2s.

sangonomiya_kokomi.Name: All Streams Flow to the Sea
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Kurage's Oath by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

sangonomiya_kokomi.Name: Sango Isshin
Descriptions: While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by Nereid's Ascension, Sangonomiya Kokomi gains a 40% Hydro DMG Bonus for 4s after her Normal and Charged Attacks heal a character with 80% or more HP.

layla.Name: Fortress of Fantasy
Descriptions: The Shield Absorption of the Curtain of Slumber generated by Nights of Formal Focus is increased by 20%.

Additionally, when unleashing Nights of Formal Focus, she will generate a shield for any nearby party members who are not being protected by a Curtain of Slumber. This shield will have 35% of the absorption of a Curtain of Slumber, will last for 12s, and will absorb Cryo DMG with 250% effectiveness.

layla.Name: Light's Remit
Descriptions: When Shooting Stars from Nights of Formal Focus strike opponents, they will each restore 1 Energy to Layla. Each Shooting Star can restore Energy to her in this manner once.

layla.Name: Secrets of the Night
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Nights of Formal Focus by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

layla.Name: Starry Illumination
Descriptions: When Nights of Formal Focus starts to fire off Shooting Stars, it will grant all nearby party members the Dawn Star effect, causing their Normal and Charged Attack DMG to increase based on 5% of Layla's Max HP.
Dawn Star can last up to 3s and will be removed 0.05s after dealing Normal or Charged Attack DMG.

layla.Name: Stream of Consciousness
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Dream of the Star-Stream Shaker by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

layla.Name: Radiant Soulfire
Descriptions: Shooting Stars from Nights of Formal Focus deal 40% increased DMG, and Starlight Slugs from Dream of the Star-Stream Shaker deal 40% increased DMG.
Additionally, the interval between the creation of Night Stars via Nights of Formal Focus is decreased by 20%.

lisa.Name: Infinite Circuit
Descriptions: Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding Violet Arc.
A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

lisa.Name: Electromagnetic Field
Descriptions: Holding Violet Arc has the following effects:
Increases DEF by 25%.
Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

lisa.Name: Resonant Thunder
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Lightning Rose by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

lisa.Name: Plasma Eruption
Descriptions: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by Lightning Rose by 1-3.

lisa.Name: Electrocute
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Violet Arc by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

lisa.Name: Pulsating Witch
Descriptions: When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of Violet Arc's Conductive status onto nearby opponents.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

lynette.Name: A Cold Blade Like a Shadow
Descriptions: When Enigmatic Feint's Enigma Thrust hits an opponent with Shadowsign, a vortex will be created at that opponent's position that will pull nearby opponents in.

lynette.Name: Endless Mysteries
Descriptions: Whenever the Bogglecat Box summoned by Magic Trick: Astonishing Shift fires a Vivid Shot, it will fire an extra Vivid Shot.

lynette.Name: Cognition-Inverting Gaze
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Magic Trick: Astonishing Shift by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

lynette.Name: Tacit Coordination
Descriptions: Increases Enigmatic Feint's charges by 1.

lynette.Name: Obscuring Ambiguity
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Enigmatic Feint by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

lynette.Name: Watchful Eye
Descriptions: When Lynette uses Enigmatic Feint's Enigma Thrust, she will gain an Anemo Infusion and 20% Anemo DMG Bonus for 6s.

lyney.Name: Whimsical Wonders
Descriptions: Lyney can have 2 Grin-Malkin Hats present at once.
Additionally, Prop Arrows will summon 2 Grin-Malkin Hats and grant Lyney 1 extra stack of Prop Surplus. This effect can occur once every 15s.

lyney.Name: Loquacious Cajoling
Descriptions: When Lyney is on the field, he will gain a stack of Crisp Focus every 2s. This will increase his CRIT DMG by 20%. Max 3 stacks. This effect will be canceled when Lyney leaves the field.

lyney.Name: Prestidigitation
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Normal Attack: Card Force Translocation by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

lyney.Name: Well-Versed, Well-Rehearsed
Descriptions: After an opponent is hit by Lyney's Pyro Charged Attack, this opponent's Pyro RES will be decreased by 20% for 6s.

lyney.Name: To Pierce Enigmas
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Wondrous Trick: Miracle Parade by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

lyney.Name: Guarded Smile
Descriptions: When Lyney fires a Prop Arrow, he will fire a Pyrotechnic Strike: Reprised that will deal 80% of a Pyrotechnic Strike's DMG. This DMG is considered Charged Attack DMG.

mika.Name: Factor Confluence
Descriptions: The Soulwind state of Starfrost Swirl can decrease the healing interval between instances caused by Skyfeather Song's Eagleplume state. This decrease percentage is equal to the ATK SPD increase provided by Soulwind.

mika.Name: Companion's Ingress
Descriptions: When Starfrost Swirl's Flowfrost Arrow first hits an opponent, or its Rimestar Flare hits an opponent, 1 Detector stack from Passive Talent "Suppressive Barrage" will be generated.
You must have unlocked the Passive Talent "Suppressive Barrage" first.

mika.Name: Reconnaissance Experience
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Skyfeather Song by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

mika.Name: Sunfrost Encomium
Descriptions: When Mika's own Skyfeather Song's Eagleplume state heals party members, this will restore 3 Energy to Mika. This form of Energy restoration can occur 5 times during the Eagleplume state created by 1 use of Skyfeather Song.

mika.Name: Signal Arrow
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Starfrost Swirl by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

mika.Name: Companion's Counsel
Descriptions: The maximum number of Detector stacks that Starfrost Swirl's Soulwind can gain is increased by 1. You need to have unlocked the Passive Talent "Suppressive Barrage" first.
Additionally, active characters affected by Soulwind will deal 60% more Physical CRIT DMG.

mona.Name: Prophecy of Submersion
Descriptions: When any of your own party members hits an opponent affected by an Omen, the effects of Hydro-related Elemental Reactions are enhanced for 8s:
Electro-Charged DMG increases by 15%.
Vaporize DMG increases by 15%.
Hydro Swirl DMG increases by 15%.
Frozen duration is extended by 15%.

mona.Name: Lunar Chain
Descriptions: When a Normal Attack hits, there is a 20% chance that it will be automatically followed by a Charged Attack.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

mona.Name: Restless Revolution
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Stellaris Phantasm by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

mona.Name: Prophecy of Oblivion
Descriptions: When any party member attacks an opponent affected by an Omen, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

mona.Name: Mockery of Fortuna
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Mirror Reflection of Doom by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

mona.Name: Rhetorics of Calamitas
Descriptions: Upon entering Illusory Torrent, Mona gains a 60% increase to the DMG of her next Charged Attack per second of movement.
A maximum DMG Bonus of 180% can be achieved in this manner. The effect lasts for no more than 8s.

nahida.Name: The Seed of Stored Knowledge
Descriptions: When the Shrine of Maya is unleashed and the Elemental Types of the party members are being tabulated, the count will add 1 to the number of Pyro, Electro, and Hydro characters respectively.

nahida.Name: The Root of All Fullness
Descriptions: Opponents that are marked by Seeds of Skandha applied by Nahida herself will be affected by the following effects:
Burning, Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon Reaction DMG can score CRIT Hits. CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG are fixed at 20% and 100% respectively.
Within 8s of being affected by Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, DEF is decreased by 30%.

nahida.Name: The Shoot of Conscious Attainment
Descriptions: Increases the Level of All Schemes to Know by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

nahida.Name: The Stem of Manifest Inference
Descriptions: When 1/2/3/(4 or more) nearby opponents are affected by All Schemes to Know's Seeds of Skandha, Nahida's Elemental Mastery will be increased by 100/120/140/160.

nahida.Name: The Leaves of Enlightening Speech
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Illusory Heart by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

nahida.Name: The Fruit of Reason's Culmination
Descriptions: When Nahida hits an opponent affected by All Schemes to Know's Seeds of Skandha with Normal or Charged Attacks after unleashing Illusory Heart, she will use Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion on this opponent and all connected opponents, dealing Dendro DMG based on 200% of Nahida's ATK and 400% of her Elemental Mastery.
DMG dealt by Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion is considered Elemental Skill DMG and can be triggered once every 0.2s.
This effect can last up to 10s and will be removed after Nahida has unleashed 6 instances of Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion.

navia.Name: A Lady's Rules for Keeping a Courteous Distance
Descriptions: Each stack of Crystal Shrapnel consumed when Navia uses Ceremonial Crystalshot will restore 3 Energy to her and decrease the CD of As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute by 1s. Up to 9 Energy can be gained this way, and the CD of "As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute" can be decreased by up to 3s.

navia.Name: The President's Pursuit of Victory
Descriptions: Each stack of Crystal Shrapnel consumed will increase the CRIT Rate of this Ceremonial Crystalshot instance by 12%. CRIT Rate can be increased by up to 36% in this way.

In addition, when Ceremonial Crystalshot hits an opponent, one Cannon Fire Support shot from As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute will strike near the location of the hit. Up to one instance of Cannon Fire Support can be triggered each time Ceremonial Crystalshot is used, and DMG dealt by said Cannon Fire Support this way is considered Elemental Burst DMG.

navia.Name: Businesswoman's Broad Vision
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Ceremonial Crystalshot by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

navia.Name: The Oathsworn Never Capitulate
Descriptions: When As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute hits an opponent, that opponent's Geo RES will be decreased by 20% for 8s.

navia.Name: Negotiator's Resolute Negotiations
Descriptions: Increases the Level of As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

navia.Name: The Flexible Finesse of the Spina's President
Descriptions: If more than 3 stacks of Crystal Shrapnel are consumed when using Ceremonial Crystalshot, each stack consumed beyond the first 3 increases the CRIT DMG of that Ceremonial Crystalshot by 45%, and any stacks consumed beyond the first 3 are returned to Navia.

neuvillette.Name: Venerable Institution
Descriptions: When Neuvillette takes the field, he will obtain 1 stack of Past Draconic Glories from the Passive Talent "Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority." You must first unlock the Passive Talent "Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority."
Additionally, his interruption resistance will be increased while using the Charged Attack Empowerment: Legal Evaluation and the Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment.

neuvillette.Name: Juridical Exhortation
Descriptions: The Passive Talent "Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority" will be enhanced: Each stack of Past Draconic Glories will increase the CRIT DMG of Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment by 14%. The maximum increase that can be achieved this way is 42%.
You must first unlock the Passive Talent "Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority."

neuvillette.Name: Ancient Postulation
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Normal Attack: As Water Seeks Equilibrium by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

neuvillette.Name: Crown of Commiseration
Descriptions: When Neuvillette is on the field and is healed, 1 Sourcewater Droplet will be generated. This effect can occur once every 4s.

neuvillette.Name: Axiomatic Judgment
Descriptions: Increases the Level of O Tides, I Have Returned by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

neuvillette.Name: Wrathful Recompense
Descriptions: When using Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment, Neuvillette can absorb nearby Sourcewater Droplets in an AoE. Each absorbed Droplet will increase the duration of Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment by 1s.

Additionally, when Equitable Judgment hits opponents, it will fire off 2 additional currents every 2s, each of which will deal 10% of Neuvillette's Max HP as Hydro DMG. DMG dealt this way will count as DMG dealt by Equitable Judgment.

nilou.Name: Dance of the Waning Moon
Descriptions: Dance of Haftkarsvar will be enhanced as follows:
Luminous Illusion DMG is increased by 65%.
The Tranquility Aura's duration is extended by 6s.

nilou.Name: The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain
Descriptions: After characters affected by the Golden Chalice's Bounty deal Hydro DMG to an opponent, that opponent's Hydro RES will be decreased by 35% for 10s. After a triggered Bloom reaction deals DMG to opponents, their Dendro RES will be decreased by 35% for 10s.
You need to have unlocked the "Court of Dancing Petals" Talent.

nilou.Name: Beguiling Shadowstep
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

nilou.Name: Fricative Pulse
Descriptions: After the third dance step of Dance of Haftkarsvar's Pirouette hits opponents, Nilou will gain 15 Elemental Energy, and DMG from her Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring will be increased by 50% for 8s.

nilou.Name: Twirling Light
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Dance of Haftkarsvar by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

nilou.Name: Frostbreaker's Melody
Descriptions: For every 1,000 points of Max HP, Nilou's CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG will increase by 0.6% and 1.2% respectively.
The maximum increase in CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG via this method is 30% and 60% respectively.

ningguang.Name: Piercing Fragments
Descriptions: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

ningguang.Name: Shock Effect
Descriptions: When Jade Screen is shattered, its CD will reset.
Can occur once every 6s.

ningguang.Name: Majesty be the Array of Stars
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Starshatter by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

ningguang.Name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath
Descriptions: Jade Screen increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.

ningguang.Name: Invincible be the Jade Screen
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Jade Screen by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

ningguang.Name: Grandeur be the Seven Stars
Descriptions: When Starshatter is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.

noelle.Name: I Got Your Back
Descriptions: While Sweeping Time and Breastplate are both in effect, the chance of Breastplate's healing effects activating is increased to 100%.

noelle.Name: Combat Maid
Descriptions: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

noelle.Name: Invulnerable Maid
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Breastplate by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

noelle.Name: To Be Cleaned
Descriptions: When Breastplate's duration expires or it is destroyed by DMG, it will deal 400% ATK of Geo DMG to surrounding opponents.

noelle.Name: Favonius Sweeper Master
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Sweeping Time by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

noelle.Name: Must Be Spotless
Descriptions: Sweeping Time increases Noelle's ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF.
Additionally, every opponent defeated during the skill's duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.

qiqi.Name: Ascetics of Frost
Descriptions: When the Herald of Frost hits an opponent marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.

qiqi.Name: Frozen to the Bone
Descriptions: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

qiqi.Name: Ascendant Praise
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

qiqi.Name: Divine Suppression
Descriptions: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

qiqi.Name: Crimson Lotus Bloom
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

qiqi.Name: Rite of Resurrection
Descriptions: Using Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune revives all fallen party members nearby and regenerates 50% of their HP.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

raiden_shogun.Name: Ominous Inscription
Descriptions: Chakra Desiderata will gather Resolve even faster. When Electro characters use their Elemental Bursts, the Resolve gained is increased by 80%. When characters of other Elemental Types use their Elemental Bursts, the Resolve gained is increased by 20%.

raiden_shogun.Name: Steelbreaker
Descriptions: While using Musou no Hitotachi and in the Musou Isshin state applied by Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu, the Raiden Shogun's attacks ignore 60% of opponents's DEF.

raiden_shogun.Name: Shinkage Bygones
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

raiden_shogun.Name: Pledge of Propriety
Descriptions: When the Musou Isshin state applied by Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu expires, all nearby party members (excluding the Raiden Shogun) gain 30% bonus ATK for 10s.

raiden_shogun.Name: Shogun's Descent
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Transcendence: Baleful Omen by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

raiden_shogun.Name: Wishbearer
Descriptions: While in the Musou Isshin state applied by Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu, attacks by the Raiden Shogun that are considered part of her Elemental Burst will decrease all nearby party members' (but not including the Raiden Shogun herself) Elemental Burst CD by 1s when they hit opponents.
This effect can trigger once every 1s, and can trigger a total of 5 times during the state's duration.

razor.Name: Wolf's Instinct
Descriptions: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.

razor.Name: Suppression
Descriptions: Increases CRIT Rate against opponents with less than 30% HP by 10%.

razor.Name: Soul Companion
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Lightning Fang by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

razor.Name: Bite
Descriptions: When casting Claw and Thunder (Press), opponents hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

razor.Name: Sharpened Claws
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Claw and Thunder by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

razor.Name: Lupus Fulguris
Descriptions: Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as Electro DMG.
When Razor is not using Lightning Fang, a lightning strike on an opponent will grant Razor an Electro Sigil for Claw and Thunder.

rosaria.Name: Unholy Revelation
Descriptions: When Rosaria deals a CRIT Hit, her ATK SPD increases by 10% and her Normal Attack DMG increases by 10% for 4s.

rosaria.Name: Land Without Promise
Descriptions: The duration of the Ice Lance created by Rites of Termination is increased by 4s.

rosaria.Name: The Wages of Sin
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Ravaging Confession by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

rosaria.Name: Painful Grace
Descriptions: Ravaging Confession's CRIT Hits regenerate 5 Energy for Rosaria.
Can only be triggered once each time Ravaging Confession is cast.

rosaria.Name: Last Rites
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Rites of Termination by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

rosaria.Name: Divine Retribution
Descriptions: Rites of Termination's attack decreases opponents' Physical RES by 20% for 10s.

kujou_sara.Name: Crow's Eye
Descriptions: When Tengu Juurai grant characters ATK Bonuses or hits opponents, the CD of Tengu Stormcall is decreased by 1s.
This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

kujou_sara.Name: Dark Wings
Descriptions: Unleashing Tengu Stormcall will leave a weaker Crowfeather at Kujou Sara's original position that will deal 30% of its original DMG.

kujou_sara.Name: The War Within
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Subjugation: Koukou Sendou by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

kujou_sara.Name: Conclusive Proof
Descriptions: The number of Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster released by Subjugation: Koukou Sendou is increased to 6.

kujou_sara.Name: Spellsinger
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Tengu Stormcall by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

kujou_sara.Name: Sin of Pride
Descriptions: The Electro DMG of characters who have had their ATK increased by Tengu Juurai has its Crit DMG increased by 60%.

sayu.Name: Multi-Task no Jutsu
Descriptions: The Muji-Muji Daruma created by Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry will ignore HP limits and can simultaneously attack nearby opponents and heal characters.

sayu.Name: Egress Prep
Descriptions: Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash gains the following effects:
DMG of Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick in Tapping (mobile)/Press (PC & PlayStation) Mode increased by 3.3%.
Every 0.5s in the Fuufuu Windwheel state will increase the DMG of this Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick by 3.3%. The maximum DMG increase possible through this method is 66%.

sayu.Name: Eh, the Bunshin Can Handle It
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

sayu.Name: Skiving: New and Improved
Descriptions: Sayu recovers 1.2 Energy when she triggers a Swirl reaction.
This effect occurs once every 2s.

sayu.Name: Speed Comes First
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

sayu.Name: Sleep O'Clock
Descriptions: The Muji-Muji Daruma created by Sayu's Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry will now also benefit from her Elemental Mastery. Each point of Sayu's Elemental Mastery will produce the following effects:
Increases the damage dealt by the Muji-Muji Daruma's attacks by 0.2% ATK. A maximum of 400% ATK can be gained via this method.
Increases the HP restored by the Muji-Muji Daruma by 3. A maximum of 6,000 additional HP can be restored in this manner.

shenhe.Name: Clarity of Heart
Descriptions: Spring Spirit Summoning can be used 1 more time.

shenhe.Name: Centered Spirit
Descriptions: Divine Maiden's Deliverance lasts for 6 seconds longer.
Active characters within the skill's field deals 15% increased Cryo CRIT DMG.

shenhe.Name: Seclusion
Descriptions: Increases Level of Spring Spirit Summoning by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

shenhe.Name: Insight
Descriptions: When characters under the effect of Icy Quill applied by Shenhe triggers its DMG Bonus effects, Shenhe will gain a Skyfrost Mantra stack:
When Shenhe uses Spring Spirit Summoning, she will consume all stacks of Skyfrost Mantra, increasing the DMG of that Spring Spirit Summoning by 5% for each stack consumed.
Max 50 stacks. Stacks last for 60s.

shenhe.Name: Divine Attainment
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Divine Maiden's Deliverance by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

shenhe.Name: Mystical Abandon
Descriptions: When characters trigger Icy Quill's effects using Normal and Charged Attack DMG, it does not count toward the Trigger Quota.

kuki_shinobu.Name: To Cloister Compassion
Descriptions: Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite's AoE is increased by 50%.

kuki_shinobu.Name: To Forsake Fortune
Descriptions: Grass Ring of Sanctification's duration is increased by 3s.

kuki_shinobu.Name: To Sequester Sorrow
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Sanctifying Ring by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

kuki_shinobu.Name: To Sever Sealing
Descriptions: When the Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks of the character affected by Shinobu's Grass Ring of Sanctification hit opponents, a Thundergrass Mark will land on the opponent's position and deal AoE Electro DMG based on 9.7% of Shinobu's Max HP.
This effect can occur once every 5s.

kuki_shinobu.Name: To Cease Courtesies
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

kuki_shinobu.Name: To Ward Weakness
Descriptions: When Kuki Shinobu takes lethal DMG, this instance of DMG will not take her down. This effect will automatically trigger when her HP reaches 1 and will trigger once every 60s.
When Shinobu's HP drops below 25%, she will gain 150 Elemental Mastery for 15s. This effect will trigger once every 60s.

sucrose.Name: Clustered Vacuum Field
Descriptions: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 gains 1 additional charge.

sucrose.Name: Beth: Unbound Form
Descriptions: The duration of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II is increased by 2s.

sucrose.Name: Flawless Alchemistress
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

sucrose.Name: Alchemania
Descriptions: Every 7 Normal and Charged Attacks, Sucrose will reduce the CD of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 1-7s.

sucrose.Name: Caution: Standard Flask
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

sucrose.Name: Chaotic Entropy
Descriptions: If Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.

tartaglia.Name: Foul Legacy: Tide Withholder
Descriptions: Decreases the CD of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide by 20%.

tartaglia.Name: Foul Legacy: Understream
Descriptions: When opponents affected by Riptide are defeated, Tartaglia regenerates 4 Elemental Energy.

tartaglia.Name: Abyssal Mayhem: Vortex of Turmoil
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

tartaglia.Name: Abyssal Mayhem: Hydrospout
Descriptions: If Tartaglia is in Foul Legacy: Raging Tide's Melee Stance, triggers Riptide Slash against opponents on the field affected by Riptide every 4s, otherwise, triggers Riptide Flash.

Riptide Slashes and Riptide Flashes triggered by this Constellation effect are not subject to the time intervals that would typically apply to these two Riptide effects, nor do they have any effect on those time intervals.

tartaglia.Name: Havoc: Formless Blade
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Havoc: Obliteration by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

tartaglia.Name: Havoc: Annihilation
Descriptions: When Havoc: Obliteration is cast in Melee Stance, the CD of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide is reset.
This effect will only take place once Tartaglia returns to his Ranged Stance.

thoma.Name: A Comrade's Duty
Descriptions: When a character protected by Thoma's own Blazing Barrier (Thoma excluded) is attacked, Thoma's own Blazing Blessing CD is decreased by 3s, while his own Crimson Ooyoroi's CD is decreased by 3s.
This effect can be triggered once every 20s.

thoma.Name: A Subordinate's Skills
Descriptions: Crimson Ooyoroi's duration is increased by 3s.

thoma.Name: Fortified Resolve
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Blazing Blessing by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

thoma.Name: Long-Term Planning
Descriptions: After using Crimson Ooyoroi, 15 Energy will be restored to Thoma.

thoma.Name: Raging Wildfire
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Crimson Ooyoroi by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

thoma.Name: Burning Heart
Descriptions: When a Blazing Barrier is obtained or refreshed, the DMG dealt by all party members' Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks is increased by 15% for 6s.

tighnari.Name: Beginnings Determined at the Roots
Descriptions: Tighnari's Charged Attack CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

tighnari.Name: Origins Known From the Stem
Descriptions: When there are opponents within the Vijnana-Khanda Field created by Vijnana-Phala Mine, Tighnari gains 20% Dendro DMG Bonus.
The effect will last up to 6s if the field's duration ends or if it no longer has opponents within it.

tighnari.Name: Fortunes Read Amongst the Branches
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

tighnari.Name: Withering Glimpsed in the Leaves
Descriptions: When Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft is unleashed, all nearby party members gain 60 Elemental Mastery for 8s. If the Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft triggers a Burning, Bloom, Quicken, or Spread reaction, their Elemental Mastery will be further increased by 60. This latter case will also refresh the buff state's duration.

tighnari.Name: Comprehension Amidst the Flowers
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Vijnana-Phala Mine by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

tighnari.Name: Karma Adjudged From the Leaden Fruit
Descriptions: Wreath Arrow's charging time is decreased by 0.9s, and will produce 1 additional Clusterbloom Arrow upon hit. This arrow deals 150% of Tighnari's ATK as DMG.

venti.Name: Splitting Gales
Descriptions: Fires 2 additional arrows per Aimed Shot, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.

venti.Name: Breeze of Reminiscence
Descriptions: Skyward Sonnet decreases opponents' Anemo RES and Physical RES by 12% for 10s.
Opponents launched by Skyward Sonnet suffer an additional 12% Anemo RES and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

venti.Name: Ode to Thousand Winds
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Wind's Grand Ode by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

venti.Name: Hurricane of Freedom
Descriptions: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% Anemo DMG Bonus for 10s.

venti.Name: Concerto dal Cielo
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Skyward Sonnet by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

venti.Name: Storm of Defiance
Descriptions: Targets who take DMG from Wind's Grand Ode have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

wanderer.Name: Shoban: Ostentatious Plumage
Descriptions: When in the Windfavored state, the Attack SPD of the Wanderer's Kuugo: Fushoudan and Kuugo: Toufukai is increased by 10%.
Additionally, the wind arrows fired by the Passive Talent "Gales of Reverie" will deal an additional 25% of his ATK as DMG. You must unlock the Passive Talent "Gales of Reverie" first.

wanderer.Name: Niban: Moonlit Isle Amidst White Waves
Descriptions: When in the Windfavored state, Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays will see its DMG increased by 4% per point of difference between the max amount of Kuugoryoku Points contrasted with Kuugoryoku's present capacity when using this skill.
Through this method, you can increase Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays's DMG by a maximum of 200%.

wanderer.Name: Sanban: Moonflower Kusemai
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

wanderer.Name: Yonban: Set Adrift into Spring
Descriptions: When casting Hanega: Song of the Wind, should the Passive Talent "Jade-Claimed Flower" be triggered, the character will gain buffs in correspondence to the contacted Elemental Type(s), and also obtain a random untriggered buff. A maximum of 3 such corresponding elemental buffs can exist simultaneously.
You must unlock the Passive Talent "Jade-Claimed Flower" first.

wanderer.Name: Matsuban: Ancient Illuminator From Abroad
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Hanega: Song of the Wind by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

wanderer.Name: Shugen: The Curtains' Melancholic Sway
Descriptions: When the Wanderer actively hits an opponent with Kuugo: Fushoudan while in the Windfavored state, the following effects will occur:
Deals an additional instance of Kuugo: Fushoudan at the position hit, dealing 40% of the attack's original DMG. This DMG will be considered Normal Attack DMG.

When the Wanderer falls below 40 Kuugoryoku Points, restores 4 Points to him. Kuugoryoku Points can be restored in this manner once every 0.2s. This restoration can occur up to 5 times within one Windfavored duration.

wriothesley.Name: Terror for the Evildoers
Descriptions: The Gracious Rebuke from the Passive Talent "There Shall Be a Plea for Justice" is changed to this:
