When Wriothesley's HP is less than 60% or while he is in the Chilling Penalty state caused by Icefang Rush, when the fifth attack of Repelling Fists hits, it will create a Gracious Rebuke. 1 Gracious Rebuke effect can be obtained every 2.5s.
Additionally, Rebuke: Vaulting Fist will obtain the following enhancement:
The DMG Bonus gained will be further increased to 200%.
When it hits while Wriothesley is in the Chilling Penalty state, that state's duration is extended by 4s. 1 such extension can occur per 1 Chilling Penalty duration.
You must first unlock the Passive Talent "There Shall Be a Plea for Justice."

wriothesley.Name: Shackles for the Arrogant
Descriptions: When using Darkgold Wolfbite, each Prosecution Edict stack from the Passive Talent "There Shall Be a Reckoning for Sin" will increase said ability's DMG dealt by 40%.
You must first unlock the Passive Talent "There Shall Be a Reckoning for Sin."

wriothesley.Name: Punishment for the Frauds
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Normal Attack: Forceful Fists of Frost by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

wriothesley.Name: Redemption for the Suffering
Descriptions: The HP restored to Wriothesley through Rebuke: Vaulting Fist will be increased to 50% of his Max HP. You must first unlock the Passive Talent "There Shall Be a Plea for Justice."

Additionally, when Wriothesley is healed, if the amount of healing overflows, the following effects will occur depending on whether he is on the field or not. If he is on the field, his ATK SPD will be increased by 20% for 4s. If he is off-field, all of your own party members' ATK SPD will be increased by 10% for 6s. These two methods of increasing ATK SPD cannot stack.

wriothesley.Name: Mercy for the Wronged
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Darkgold Wolfbite by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

wriothesley.Name: Esteem for the Innocent
Descriptions: The CRIT Rate of Rebuke: Vaulting Fist will be increased by 10%, and its CRIT DMG by 80%. When unleashed, it will also create an additional icicle that deals 100% of Rebuke: Vaulting Fist's Base DMG as Cryo DMG. DMG dealt this way is regarded as Charged Attack DMG.
You must first unlock the Passive Talent "There Shall Be a Plea for Justice."

xiangling.Name: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
Descriptions: Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their Pyro RES reduced by 15% for 6s.

xiangling.Name: Oil Meets Fire
Descriptions: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

xiangling.Name: Deepfry
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Pyronado by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

xiangling.Name: Slowbake
Descriptions: Pyronado's duration is increased by 40%.

xiangling.Name: Guoba Mad
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Guoba Attack by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

xiangling.Name: Condensed Pyronado
Descriptions: For the duration of Pyronado, all party members receive a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus.

xiao.Name: Dissolution Eon: Destroyer of Worlds
Descriptions: Increases Lemniscatic Wind Cycling's charges by 1.

xiao.Name: Annihilation Eon: Blossom of Kaleidos
Descriptions: When in the party and not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.

xiao.Name: Conqueror of Evil: Wrath Deity
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

xiao.Name: Transcension: Extinction of Suffering
Descriptions: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

xiao.Name: Evolution Eon: Origin of Ignorance
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Bane of All Evil by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

xiao.Name: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
Descriptions: While under the effects of Bane of All Evil, hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling, and for the next 1s, he may use Lemniscatic Wind Cycling while ignoring its CD.

xingqiu.Name: The Scent Remained
Descriptions: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.

xingqiu.Name: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky
Descriptions: Extends the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3s.
Decreases the Hydro RES of opponents hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.

xingqiu.Name: Weaver of Verses
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

xingqiu.Name: Evilsoother
Descriptions: Throughout the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter, the DMG dealt by Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen is increased by 50%.

xingqiu.Name: Embrace of Rain
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

xingqiu.Name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
Descriptions: Activating 2 of Guhua Sword: Raincutter's sword rain attacks greatly enhances the third sword rain attack. On hit, the third sword rain attack also regenerates 3 Energy for Xingqiu.

xinyan.Name: Fatal Acceleration
Descriptions: Upon scoring a CRIT Hit, increases ATK SPD of Xinyan's Normal and Charged Attacks by 12% for 5s.
Can only occur once every 5s.

xinyan.Name: Impromptu Opening
Descriptions: Riff Revolution's Physical DMG has its CRIT Rate increased by 100%, and will form a shield at Shield Level 3: Rave when cast.

xinyan.Name: Double-Stop
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Sweeping Fervor by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

xinyan.Name: Wildfire Rhythm
Descriptions: Sweeping Fervor's swing DMG decreases opponent's Physical RES by 15% for 12s.

xinyan.Name: Screamin' for an Encore
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Riff Revolution by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

xinyan.Name: Rockin' in a Flaming World
Descriptions: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Xinyan's Charged Attacks by 30%. Additionally, Xinyan's Charged Attacks gain an ATK Bonus equal to 50% of her DEF.

yae_miko.Name: Yakan Offering
Descriptions: Each time Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin activates a Tenko Thunderbolt, Yae Miko will restore 8 Elemental Energy for herself.

yae_miko.Name: Fox's Mooncall
Descriptions: Sesshou Sakura start at Level 2 when created, their max level is increased to 4, and their attack range is increased by 60%.

yae_miko.Name: The Seven Glamours
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura by 3.
Maximum ugprade level is 15.

yae_miko.Name: Sakura Channeling
Descriptions: When Sesshou Sakura lightning hits opponents, the Electro DMG Bonus of all nearby party members is increased by 20% for 5s.

yae_miko.Name: Mischievous Teasing
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

yae_miko.Name: Forbidden Art: Daisesshou
Descriptions: The Sesshou Sakura's attacks will ignore 60% of the opponent's DEF.

yanfei.Name: The Law Knows No Kindness
Descriptions: When Yanfei uses her Charged Attack, each existing Scarlet Seal additionally reduces the stamina cost of this Charged Attack by 10% and increases resistance against interruption during its release.

yanfei.Name: Right of Final Interpretation
Descriptions: Increases Yanfei's Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 20% against enemies below 50% HP.

yanfei.Name: Samadhi Fire-Forged
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Signed Edict by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

yanfei.Name: Supreme Amnesty
Descriptions: When Done Deal is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 45% of Yanfei's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs Pyro DMG 250% more effectively.

yanfei.Name: Abiding Affidavit
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Done Deal by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

yanfei.Name: Extra Clause
Descriptions: Increases the maximum number of Scarlet Seals by 1.

yaoyao.Name: Adeptus' Tutelage
Descriptions: When White Jade Radishes explode, active characters within their AoE will gain 15% Dendro DMG Bonus for 8s and have 15 Stamina restored to them. This form of Stamina Restoration can only be triggered every 5s.

yaoyao.Name: Innocent
Descriptions: While affected by the Adeptal Legacy state caused by Moonjade Descent, if White Jade Radish explosions damage opponents, 3 Energy will be restored to Yaoyao. This form of Energy regeneration can occur once every 0.8s.

yaoyao.Name: Loyal and Kind
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Raphanus Sky Cluster by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

yaoyao.Name: Winsome
Descriptions: After using Raphanus Sky Cluster or Moonjade Descent, Yaoyao's Elemental Mastery will be increased based on 0.3% of her Max HP for 8s. The maximum Elemental Mastery she can gain this way is 120.

yaoyao.Name: Compassionate
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Moonjade Descent by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

yaoyao.Name: Beneficent
Descriptions: For every 2 White Jade Radishes Yuegui: Throwing Mode throws out, it will also throw a Mega Radish that will have a larger AoE than the standard White Jade Radish and have the following effects upon exploding:
Deals AoE Dendro DMG based on 75% of Yaoyao's ATK.
Restores HP for the active character based on 7.5% of Yaoyao's Max HP.
Every Yuegei: Throwing Mode can throw out a maximum of 2 Mega Radishes.

yelan.Name: Enter the Plotters
Descriptions: Lingering Lifeline gains 1 additional charge.

yelan.Name: Taking All Comers
Descriptions: When Exquisite Throw conducts a coordinated attack, it will fire an additional water arrow that will deal 14% of Yelan's Max HP as Hydro DMG.
This effect can trigger once every 1.8s.

yelan.Name: Beware the Trickster's Dice
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Depth-Clarion Dice by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

yelan.Name: Bait-and-Switch
Descriptions: Increases all party members' Max HP by 10% for 25s for every opponent marked by Lifeline when the Lifeline explodes. A maximum increase of 40% Max HP can be attained in this manner.

yelan.Name: Dealer's Sleight
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Lingering Lifeline by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

yelan.Name: Winner Takes All
Descriptions: After using Depth-Clarion Dice, Yelan will enter the Mastermind state.

In this state, all of Yelan's Normal Attacks will be special Breakthrough Barbs. These Breakthrough Barbs will have similar abilities to normal ones and the DMG dealt will be considered Charged Attack DMG, dealing 156% of a normal Breakthrough Barb's DMG.
The Mastermind state lasts 20s and will be cleared after Yelan fires 5 arrows.

yoimiya.Name: Agate Ryuukin
Descriptions: The Aurous Blaze created by Ryuukin Saxifrage lasts for an extra 4s.
Additionally, when an opponent affected by Aurous Blaze is defeated within its duration, Yoimiya's ATK is increased by 20% for 20s.

yoimiya.Name: A Procession of Bonfires
Descriptions: When Yoimiya's Pyro DMG scores a CRIT Hit, Yoimiya will gain a 25% Pyro DMG Bonus for 6s.
This effect can be triggered even when Yoimiya is not the active character.

yoimiya.Name: Trickster's Flare
Descriptions: Increase the Level of Niwabi Fire-Dance by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

yoimiya.Name: Pyrotechnic Professional
Descriptions: When Yoimiya's own Aurous Blaze triggers an explosion, Niwabi Fire-Dance's CD is decreased by 1.2.

yoimiya.Name: A Summer Festival's Eve
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Ryuukin Saxifrage by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

yoimiya.Name: Naganohara Meteor Swarm
Descriptions: During Niwabi Fire-Dance, Yoimiya's Normal Attacks have a 50% chance of firing an extra Kindling Arrow that deals 60% of its original DMG. This DMG is considered Normal Attack DMG.

yun_jin.Name: Thespian Gallop
Descriptions: Opening Flourish's CD is decreased by 18%.

yun_jin.Name: Myriad Mise-En-Scène
Descriptions: After Cliffbreaker's Banner is unleashed, all nearby party members' Normal Attack DMG is increased by 15% for 12s.

yun_jin.Name: Seafaring General
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Cliffbreaker's Banner by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

yun_jin.Name: Flower and a Fighter
Descriptions: When Yun Jin triggers the Crystallize Reaction, her DEF is increased by 20% for 12s.

yun_jin.Name: Famed Throughout the Land
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Opening Flourish by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

yun_jin.Name: Decorous Harmony
Descriptions: Characters under the effects of the Flying Cloud Flag Formation have their Normal ATK SPD increased by 12%.

zhongli.Name: Rock, the Backbone of Earth
Descriptions: Increases the maximum number of Stone Steles created by Dominus Lapidis that may exist simultaneously to 2.

zhongli.Name: Stone, the Cradle of Jade
Descriptions: Planet Befall grants nearby characters on the field a Jade Shield when it descends.

zhongli.Name: Jade, Shimmering through Darkness
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Dominus Lapidis by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

zhongli.Name: Topaz, Unbreakable and Fearless
Descriptions: Increases Planet Befall's AoE by 20% and increases the duration of Planet Befall's Petrification effect by 2s.

zhongli.Name: Lazuli, Herald of the Order
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Planet Befall by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

zhongli.Name: Chrysos, Bounty of Dominator
Descriptions: When the Jade Shield takes DMG, 40% of that incoming DMG is converted to HP for the current character.
A single instance of regeneration cannot exceed 8% of that character's Max HP.

traveler_anemo.Name: Raging Vortex
Descriptions: Palm Vortex pulls in opponents and objects within a 5m radius.

traveler_anemo.Name: Uprising Whirlwind
Descriptions: Increases Energy Recharge by 16%.

traveler_anemo.Name: Sweeping Gust
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Gust Surge by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

traveler_anemo.Name: Cherishing Breezes
Descriptions: Reduces DMG taken while casting Palm Vortex by 10%.

traveler_anemo.Name: Vortex Stellaris
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Palm Vortex by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

traveler_anemo.Name: Intertwined Winds
Descriptions: Targets who take DMG from Gust Surge have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

traveler_geo.Name: Invincible Stonewall
Descriptions: Party members within the radius of Wake of Earth have their CRIT Rate increased by 10% and have increased resistance against interruption.

traveler_geo.Name: Rockcore Meltdown
Descriptions: When the meteorite created by Starfell Sword is destroyed, it will also explode, dealing additional AoE Geo DMG equal to the amount of damage dealt by Starfell Sword.

traveler_geo.Name: Will of the Rock
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Wake of Earth by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

traveler_geo.Name: Reaction Force
Descriptions: The shockwave triggered by Wake of Earth regenerates 5 Energy for every opponent hit.
A maximum of 25 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

traveler_geo.Name: Meteorite Impact
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Starfell Sword by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

traveler_geo.Name: Everlasting Boulder
Descriptions: The barrier created by Wake of Earth lasts 5s longer.
The meteorite created by Starfell Sword lasts 10s longer.

traveler_electro.Name: Spring Thunder of Fertility
Descriptions: The number of Abundance Amulets that can be generated using Lightning Blade is increased to 3.

traveler_electro.Name: Violet Vehemence
Descriptions: When Falling Thunder created by Bellowing Thunder hits an opponent, it will decrease their Electro RES by 15% for 8s.

traveler_electro.Name: Distant Crackling
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Bellowing Thunder by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

traveler_electro.Name: Fickle Cloudstrike
Descriptions: When a character obtains Abundance Amulets generated by Lightning Blade, if this character's Energy is less than 35%, the Energy restored by the Abundance Amulets is increased by 100%.

traveler_electro.Name: Clamor in the Wilds
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Lightning Blade by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

traveler_electro.Name: World-Shaker
Descriptions: Every 2 Falling Thunder attacks triggered by Bellowing Thunder will significantly increase the DMG dealt by the next Falling Thunder, dealing 200% of its original DMG, and will restore an additional 1 Energy to the current character.

traveler_dendro.Name: Symbiotic Creeper
Descriptions: After Razorgrass Blade hits an opponent, it will regenerate 3.5 Energy for the Traveler.

traveler_dendro.Name: Green Resilience
Descriptions: Lea Lotus Lamp's duration is increased by 3s.

traveler_dendro.Name: Whirling Weeds
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Razorgrass Blade by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

traveler_dendro.Name: Treacle Grass
Descriptions: After the Lea Lotus Lamp triggers a Lotuslight Transfiguration, it will obtain 5 stacks of the Overflowing Lotuslight effect from the Passive Talent "Verdant Overgrowth."
You must have unlocked this Passive Talent first.

traveler_dendro.Name: Viridian Transience
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Surgent Manifestation by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

traveler_dendro.Name: Withering Aggregation
Descriptions: The Dendro DMG Bonus of the character under the effect of Overflowing Lotuslight as created by the Lea Lotus Lamp is increased by 12%. If the Lamp has experienced a Lotuslight Transfiguration previously, the character will also gain 12% DMG Bonus for the corresponding element.

traveler_hydro.Name: Swelling Lake
Descriptions: Picking up a Sourcewater Droplet will restore 2 Energy to the Traveler.
Requires the Passive Talent "Spotless Waters."

traveler_hydro.Name: Trickling Purity
Descriptions: The Movement SPD of Rising Waters' bubble will be decreased by 30%, and its duration increased by 3s.

traveler_hydro.Name: Turbulent Ripples
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Aquacrest Saber by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

traveler_hydro.Name: Pouring Descent
Descriptions: When using Aquacrest Saber, an Aquacrest Aegis that can absorb 10% of the Traveler's Max HP in DMG will be created and will absorb Hydro DMG with 250% effectiveness. It will persist until the Traveler finishes using the skill.

Once every 2s, after a Dewdrop hits an opponent, if the Traveler is being protected by Aquacrest Aegis, the DMG Absorption of the Aegis will be restored to 10% of the Traveler's Max HP. If the Traveler is not presently being protected by an Aegis, one will be redeployed.

traveler_hydro.Name: Churning Whirlpool
Descriptions: Increases the Level of Rising Waters by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

traveler_hydro.Name: Tides of Justice
Descriptions: When the Traveler picks up a Sourcewater Droplet, they will restore HP to the nearest party member with the lowest HP percentage remaining based on 6% of their Max HP.
